arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
english: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.
And when you have decided, then rely upon Allah.

arabic: لاَ تَدْرِي لَعَلَّ اللّهَ يُحْدِثُ بَعْدَ ذَلِكَ أَمْرًا
english: You do not know; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
And give good tidings to the patient.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
english: Indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of the doers of good.

arabic: وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
english: And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.

arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى الْحَيِّ الَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ
english: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
